name: SaleLocator
tag_list: shopping, local-search, in-store-sales, retail-sales, bargain, research-online-buy-offline
overview:
SaleLocator is a local sales and shopping search engine and app that brings local retail sales information to local shoppers. A nationwide local retail sales finder also available as an iPhone and Android app, SaleLocator offers the country’s largest collection of in-store sale information to help bargain hunters find the best ongoing sales near them. SaleLocator showcases local brick-and-mortar sales in all US markets, from the smallest towns to the biggest cities.

Terrific for research online, buy offline shoppers, there are no sign-ups necessary, no circulars to search, no coupons to print, no group buying, no waiting and no shipping. SaleLocator brings together advertised and unadvertised promotions that are already happening in the consumer’s neighborhood, and shoppers can search for local retail sales (based on your city, state or zip) by keyword and category.

How It Works Find local brick-and-mortar retail sales by proximity, category and keyword Click on the store name for location, items on sale, directions, map, phone number

Features Local Stores & Sales Local Mall Info Robust Search Maps & Driving Directions Share the sale via Facebook, Twitter, email Save the sale to your SaleLocator account via My Sales Use personalized email sales alerts to receive daily, weekly, monthly sales updates

milestones.source_description: Find list of all local sales on one single website

SaleLocator for Android: Help Bargain Shoppers Find What's On Sale Nearby
